org.cloudbus.foggatewaylib.bluetooth.ui

Class BluetoothDevicesFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
      • org.cloudbus.foggatewaylib.bluetooth.ui.BluetoothDevicesFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner, androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelStoreOwner, BluetoothDeviceListAdapter.OnItemClickListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ChooseDeviceFragment, PairBluetoothLeFragment

    public abstract class BluetoothDevicesFragment
extends androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
implements BluetoothDeviceListAdapter.OnItemClickListener
    A simple Fragment that holds a list of bluetooth devices. NB: an empty constructor is required when extending this class.
    Author:
    Riccardo Mancini
    See Also:
    BluetoothDeviceListAdapter

      • BluetoothDevicesFragment

        public BluetoothDevicesFragment(@LayoutRes
                                int layout,
                                @IdRes
                                int listID)
        Constructs a new fragment with the given layout ID and list ID. NB: an empty constructor is required when extending this class.
        Parameters:
        layout - the resource id for the layout to be inflated.
        listID - the rsource id for the list within the specified layout.
